title: Interpretation of seeing giving money in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing money in a dream: There have been many interpretations of seeing money being given in a dream, as the meaning of the dream varies from one case to another, and the vision differs in how money is donated in the dream as well. Interpretation of seeing money being given in a dream to an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin said about The vision of giving money to an unmarried woman has more than one meaning, as you can through the different website learn about the interpretation of this dream through the following: Ibn Sirin says that the only girl who sees money in her dream is evidence that she is ambitious and courageous and is trying to achieve a big dream and her dream will come true. God willing. But if she sees money in her dream in the form of paper money, this is evidence that she will get married soon and the interpretation of the dream may be that she will soon own real estate or gold. If a girl sees coins in her dream, this means that she will face major problems in her life with her family or Her friends and therefore she must be careful when making any decision and not in a hurry. Ibn Sirin also interpreted the dream of an unmarried woman who has money and the dream of losing her bag as evidence that she was wasting her time on worthless things. Also, seeing an unmarried girl in her dream indicates... She gets money from her lover and there were disagreements between them that the problems will be solved. It also indicates that the coming period of her life will be calm. As for the unmarried girl who saw money in her dream while she was studying, and the one who gave her the money was her teacher, this is evidence of... She excelled in her studies and achieved the highest grades. Interpretation of giving money in a dream to a married woman. Interpretation of seeing money in a dream. There are different interpretations to interpret the vision of giving money in a dream to a married woman, such as: If the money in the vision is paper money, this is evidence that this woman is satisfied and has children. They possess many of her qualities, so she needs to develop these ideas and instill them in them. In the case of seeing coins, it has a different interpretation, as silver coins represent boys and gold coins represent girls, and this vision shows the necessity of approaching her children and giving them advice. As for the married woman who sees in her dream If she finds money on her way, this means that she will meet a loyal friend in her life, so she must protect him. If the married woman with the vision is pregnant and sees coins in her dream, this indicates that she will face many difficulties in giving birth to her child. If the pregnant woman sees money On paper, this is evidence that she will give birth before her due date, as silver coins indicate that she will give birth to a male, and gold coins indicate that she will give birth to a female. Ibn Sirin also explained that seeing a married woman taking money from her husband is evidence that she will obtain a promotion in his job and will live with him. A decent life. While seeing a married woman taking money from her friends indicates that she will face many problems with her friend from whom she took money. Interpretation of giving money in a married man’s dream. Many scholars said in interpreting the vision

title: Interpretation of a dream about eating chickpeas in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about eating chickpeas in a dream Scientists give different meanings to what we see in dreams. Interpretation of a dream about eating chickpeas in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about eating chickpeas in a dream Cooked chickpeas may indicate freedom from trouble, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself eating cooked chickpeas, this may indicate paying off debts. And God knows best. If a young man sees himself in a dream eating cooked chickpeas, this may represent the achievement of goals, and God knows the unseen. While the vision of eating hot chickpeas may indicate love of desires, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about eating pigeons in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about eating pigeons in a dream could indicate goodness, and God knows best. If he sees An unmarried young man in a dream eats pigeons, this may be evidence of marriage, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If an unmarried girl sees herself eating pigeons, this may indicate that her marriage is approaching, and God knows the unseen. A dream about eating stuffed pigeons can also indicate a good deed, and God has all knowledge of the unseen. Interpretation of a dream Eating triangles of cheese in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about eating triangles of cheese in a dream. We did not find specific explanations for his vision. If a married woman is seen eating soft cheese, this may be good and sustenance, God willing. If a girl is seen eating soft cheese, it may represent food, God willing. If the dreamer sees himself eating cheese, this may lead to To goodness and food, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about eating cooked turkey in a dream. Interpretation of a dream that you eat cooked turkey in a dream could be a sign of happiness, and God knows all that is unseen. When you see a married man eating cooked turkey in a dream, this may lead to a comfortable life, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees herself eating a cooked turkey, this may lead to a rich life, and God knows the unseen. While if a married woman sees herself in a dream eating a cooked turkey, this may mean that she is living a good life, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about eating corn in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about eating Corn in a dream could indicate money for the dreamer, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees himself eating corn in a dream, this may be a sign of what is good for him, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees green corn, this may represent the achievement of her goal, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. It expresses the achievement of goals and desires, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about eating basil in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about eating basil in a dream could be a sign of goodness and nourishment, and God knows the unseen. title: Interpretation of eggshells in a dream and eating eggshells in a dream

preview.html: Seeing an eggshell in a dream is one of the confusing interpretations, such as breaking the eggshell, throwing it away, eating the eggshell, vomiting the eggshell, etc., as many people search for it if they see it in a dream to get the correct interpretation of it. The vision that appears to us in many different forms has many different meanings and associations that the dreamer must know. Eggs are very beautiful nutritional meals that are found in our lives in many forms and give the body a lot of energy and important benefits that cannot be obtained from any other foods, and we will explain to you. Interpretation of eggshells in a dream, as interpreted by great commentators such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and others: Interpretation of eggshells in a dream Seeing eggshells in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will achieve a lot of success and kindness in the near future. Also, eating eggshells in our dreams indicates That he will receive blessings in all his endeavors and achieve goodness. Eggshells, in general, are dreams that carry a lot of goodness, unless the eggs are rotten. And whoever sees that he is carrying eggs, then eats the shells and leaves what was in his waist, this is interpreted in two ways: eating the dead person’s money, Or take their shrouds. Interpretation of eggshells in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar said that seeing eggshells in a dream means that you will get a lot of money in reality, and it also indicates marriage, and God knows best. If a man sees a hen laying eggshells in a dream, this means that His wife will soon give birth to a son, God willing. When she sees boiled eggshells in a dream, the dreamer shows that the problems in his life will be reconciled, God willing. Also, seeing a lot of eggshells suggests to an unmarried girl that she is close to a righteous man, God willing. Collecting eggshells in a dream shows The dreamer has his love of collecting money and getting rich if he is poor, and it also shows the fulfillment of aspirations in reality. Interpretation of eggshells in a dream according to Nabulsi. Al-Jalil Al-Kabir will interpret and say that seeing eggshells in a dream indicates to the dreamer that he is eating from illegal money and will suffer from stress and distress as a result of eating illegal money. Project. Seeing broken eggshells in a dream means that the dreamer’s father is dying, and God knows best and knows the unseen. Seeing eggshells in a dream also indicates to the viewer that he will earn money from buying and selling in reality. Seeing rotten eggshells indicates obtaining money by deception, which is forbidden money, by God. I know. Seeing an absolute woman with eggshells in a dream indicates good circumstances and the achievement of her life goals, God willing.

title: Interpretation of seeing a loved one after parting in a dream, the correct and complete interpretation

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a lover after parting in a dream: Loved ones are the people towards whom we feel tenderness and warmth. They bring us a feeling of joy, and without them we feel sad and sad. Interpretation of seeing a lover after parting in a dream: When you see your ex-lover or your girlfriend in a dream and you are upset, this means that you are in trouble. And you need to This person is to be your support and help, and you miss his presence in your life a lot. Your inner feelings, which are controlled by your subconscious mind, reject the separation that occurred between you and this translates into a dream of seeing this beloved person. That is why we advise you to contact this person, as this dream may be the beginning of a renewed relationship again. Seeing an ex-lover in a dream can also mean that you feel lonely, hopeless and bored. Therefore, these feelings are translated into dreams, and since the feeling of love was linked to that person. Therefore, you see him in your dreams satisfying your latent emotional desire. You did not find anyone to satisfy you after him. But what It is the interpretation of seeing your ex-lover in distress or someone sending him a message through you. Of course, this is not an interpretation of the underlying feelings, but rather that there is an interpretation of seeing a loved one after parting in a dream while he is in a state of distress. It means that this person is facing a big problem In his life, he is suffering from heartache and you see him. As for this, it is a spiritual invitation for you to stand by his side because he really needs you, but he does not know how to contact you. And he makes you stand by him, or that your dream carries a specific message that only he can understand. And if you dreamed that you were with the person who... You love him after breaking up, and the dream was a memory of some situation, whether it was a happy situation or a quarrel between you. This is evidence that you are living a love story now and that your subconscious remembers a similar situation that happened with your ex-lover. Perhaps the dream contains the gentle movements that he loved so much to remind you that you can do With your current lover now. Or you are committing the same mistake you made with your previous lover and you must be careful not to make the same mistake again. Interpretation of seeing a lover in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of seeing a lover after parting in a dream for a single woman is evidence that she has not passed this period of her life. Her feelings are still linked to that period, and if she sees her ex-boyfriend while she is in a new relationship. This is evidence that you are not comfortable with your current lover and that you did not find in him what made you happy in your old lover. This may be a sign that you miss him very much and there are some details that you miss in him. Your current relationship. Maybe you and your current boyfriend don't have the same love language, and that's what keeps you inside. You refuse to admit it, but seeing your ex and you are unhappy and suffocated. This is proof that your old relationship was the one that caused you hurt and that there is an underlying desire. To move forward and experience a new life with a new person, you have to start a new hobby. It distracts you from thinking about emotional feelings and makes you feel more comfortable in your life. If a girl dreams that her ex-boyfriend is giving her emotional advice, it means that she is dealing with her current lover. Alone, The way you insist

title: Interpretation of cookies in a dream: seeing buying cookies

preview.html: Cookies in a dream for a single woman, a pregnant woman, a married woman, for a man eating sweet chocolate cookies, making cookies, distributing cookiesInterpretation of cookies in a dream Cookies indicate rising prices, you may want to buy something and the price is more expensive than you expectIf you dream that you are eating, giving, taking or stealing cookies, it means that you are letting some trivial matters and small problems bother you. If you dream that you are baking cookies, it indicates feelings of optimism and superiority and this can also mean a rise in status. If you dream that you cannot reach the cookies, it means that someone else is trying to reap your benefits, or in other words, someone is seeking to reap the benefits of your hard work. But if you manage to get the cookies, it means that you are fully aware of your surroundings and the people around you, and it may mean that you will regain control. Cookies are food, and living either by money or by marriage, and if you eat them, the dream means that you will agree with the groomSeeing or eating chocolate chip cookies symbolizes your feeling of guilt, and if You saw yourself baking chocolate chip cookies, this indicates your intimate and emotional relationship with a certain person. If you dream that you are eating oatmeal cookies, this indicates your need for release from time to time. Interpretation of cookies in a dream by Ibn Sirin Eating cookies in a dream may indicate a family dispute. This dream can also mean that you have a clear and creative appetite for writing. Seeing cookies in a dream means that you may have an unprecedented dependence on others. Cookies in a dream mean that you are allowing others to help you, and this is a positive trait. Baking cookies in a dream means that there is an aspect of your life where you feel trapped. Buying cookies in a dream indicates that you will receive some material goods. Dipping a piece of cookie in a drink (such as tea or coffee) means that you have to make a decision and you need to make sure that everything in your dream really seems right. Dreaming of dark chocolate cookies means that you will have happy times in the future. Dreaming of children making cookies means that you will get in touch with the playful side of your nature. If you dream of dry cookies such as custard cookies, water biscuits, oatmeal cookies, or crisp bread that is usually eaten with cheddar after a meal, it means that it is time to enjoy life and enjoy things. If you dream that you are eating cookies in bed, it is a sign of family disputes. Dreaming that someone is preparing cookies means that you will enjoy And make moneyCookies in your dream can be a sign of poor health and difficult and dangerous situationsCookies can be a sign of poor health and difficult and dangerous situations

title: Interpretation of a dream about menstrual blood for unmarried women in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and al-Nabulsi

preview.html: What did Ibn Sirin say about the interpretation of a dream about menstrual blood for an unmarried woman? Interpretation of a dream about menstrual blood for an unmarried woman in a dream. Does Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of this vision differ from Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation, or did the jurists agree on the interpretation? Is seeing a woman’s blood inside the home different from seeing it outside the home? When does a dream interpret warnings? Learn about the comprehensive meaning of this dream in the following paragraphs. You have a confused dream, what are you waiting for? Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. Interpretation of a dream about menstrual blood for a single woman. Al-Nabulsi said: If an unmarried woman sees menstruation in a dream, she is sinful and her actions are hated, and her lifestyle is very bad and needs to be corrected and modified so that her behavior is not hated among people and everyone stays away. Some of the great interpreters disagreed with Al-Nabulsi and said that the menstrual cycle in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates marriage and good offspring. If an unmarried woman sees her sick mother menstruating in a dream and the amount of blood is heavy and frightening, then the dream indicates the death of the mother and the dreamer’s sadness over the separation. Her mother. When the dreamer felt disgusted by the menstrual blood that stained her body, she bathed, used fragrant perfumes, and wore beautiful clothes in the dream. Interpretation of a dream of menstrual blood for unmarried women by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Shirin proposed to the unmarried woman and told her that menstruation is full of happy associations in these cases: Mother No: If she is miserable, surrounded by sadness, and makes her constantly depressed, then if she menstruates in a dream, God will grant her happiness and mental and psychological peace, and remove from her life all the circumstances that caused her sadness. Second: Menstrual blood is for a poor dreamer or for someone who complains about unemployment and lack of money. It indicates an increase in money, diligence in work, and levels of competence in it. Third: If she dreams that she is menstruating in a dream and is attended by a young man whom she knows and loves in reality, then this is a strong message and happy news that he is destined for her and will be a good husband for her. Fourth: If an unmarried woman menstruates in a dream Without feeling pain, she is satisfied with her stable and free life, because if she feels pain in the abdomen and back during menstruation, the dream does not fall into auspicious visions, but rather indicates distress. . And the difficulty of matters and the occurrence of problems and crises. The most important interpretations of a dream about menstrual blood for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about washing menstrual blood for a single woman. If a girl sees her clothes contaminated with menstruation and cleans them and notices that the menstrual blood is easily cleaned from the clothes, then this is a sign of salvation and a quick end to misery. A lot of effort and time to get rid of it. Some commentators said that seeing a garment clean of menstrual blood is evidence of changing her life and cleansing her heart of impurity, as well as her commitment to religion and stopping any behavior that worsens her bad deeds and mistakes. It will keep her away from the Lord of the Worlds. Even if the dreamer washed her clothes from the blood, but its traces remained on the clothes a little, a crisis that bothered her in the past may be resolved, but the effect of this crisis remains. in her life and makes her feel sad and distressed from time to time. Interpretation of a dream about menstrual blood for an unmarried woman in a dream. Does Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of this vision differ from Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation, or did the jurists agree on the interpretation? Is seeing a woman’s blood inside the home different from seeing it outside the home? When does a dream interpret warnings? Learn about the comprehensive meaning of this dream in the following paragraphs. You have a confused dream, what are you waiting for? Google is an Egyptian site for interpreting dreams. Interpretation of a dream about menstrual blood for a single woman. Al-Nabulsi said: If an unmarried woman sees menstruation in a dream, she is sinful and her actions are hated, and her lifestyle is very bad and needs to be corrected and modified so that her behavior is not hated among people and everyone stays away. Some of the great interpreters disagreed with Al-Nabulsi and said that the menstrual cycle in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates marriage and good offspring. If an unmarried woman sees her sick mother menstruating in a dream and the amount of blood is heavy and frightening, then the dream indicates the death of the mother and the dreamer’s sadness over the separation. Her mother. When the dreamer felt disgusted by the menstrual blood that stained her body, she bathed, used fragrant perfumes, and wore beautiful clothes in the dream. Interpretation of a dream of menstrual blood for unmarried women by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Shirin proposed to the unmarried woman and told her that menstruation is full of happy associations in these cases: Mother No: If she is miserable, surrounded by sadness, and makes her constantly depressed, then if she menstruates in a dream, God will grant her happiness and mental and psychological peace, and remove from her life all the circumstances that caused her sadness. Second: Menstrual blood is for a poor dreamer or for someone who complains about unemployment and lack of money. It indicates an increase in money, diligence in work, and levels of competence in it. Third: If she dreams that she is menstruating in a dream and is attended by a young man whom she knows and loves in reality, then this is a strong message and happy news that he is destined for her and will be a good husband for her. Fourth: If an unmarried woman menstruates in a dream Without feeling pain, she is satisfied with her stable and free life, because if she feels pain in the abdomen and back during menstruation, the dream does not fall into auspicious visions, but rather indicates distress. . And the difficulty of matters and the occurrence of problems and crises. The most important interpretations of a dream about menstrual blood for a single woman. title: Interpretation of a dream about hair loss in detail

preview.html: Here is the interpretation of a dream about hair loss and its meaning in different situations. Experiencing hair loss in reality symbolizes the presence of a health problem in the scalp for many reasons, the most important of which is diseases, and seeing hair loss is inconvenience and distress for many women in particular, so it is a vision that bad things are like this. For men as well as women, it may indicate to some dreamers that bad things will happen to them in reality, so dream interpreters such as Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen worked hard to explain the meaning of this dream, which you will find in the encyclopedia. Interpretation of a dream about hair loss. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing hair loss in a dream. Ibn Sirin presented different interpretations of this vision. Hair loss in a dream indicates the end of crises, a change in circumstances for the better, and the end of worry and anxiety. If the dreamer is in debt to reality and sees a large amount of hair falling from his head This vision is a sign of paying off the debt, and God knows best. If the hair is black, then falling out in a dream is a sign of goodness and abundance. If the hair falls out completely in a dream, this vision is unpleasant and indicates exposure to obstacles and difficulties in reality. But if the dreamer sees that his hair is falling out And new hair appeared in its place, so this vision indicates anxiety and sadness. Interpretation of a dream about hair loss by Ibn Shaheen. Regarding Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation, he mentioned that hair loss in a dream is one of the promising visions for removing worries and sorrow, but in the case of excessive hair loss, this vision indicates a visit to the Sacred House. . Soon, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees his hair falling out in the street, this vision indicates the loss of the most important opportunities in the dreamer’s life. In the case of long hair falling out, this vision expresses illness, and God knows best. In the case of black hair falling out, this vision indicates that the dreamer is being deceived and deceived by some of those around him. As for chin hair falling out in a dream, this vision indicates good circumstances for the dreamer. Interpretation Dreaming of hair loss for unmarried women: Seeing hair loss in an unmarried girl’s dream is one of the praiseworthy visions that indicate kindness and nourishment. Seeing hair loss in a dream indicates the loss of worries and sorrows and recovery from illness, and God knows best. Seeing baldness in a dream for an unmarried woman shows intelligence. And a sharp intelligence, but if she is sad in a dream with this baldness, then this vision means that she will face difficulties. If an unmarried woman sees that she is cutting her hair in a dream, this vision indicates that she will get married soon. Interpretation of seeing hair falling out in a dream for a married woman. As for the meaning of this dream for For a married woman, it is one of the praiseworthy dreams for her, indicating goodness, happiness, and the removal of worries and sorrows. This vision for a married woman also indicates that she will become pregnant soon, but if curly hair falls out, this indicates abundant livelihood, as it is a sign of earning a lot of money. Money. If a married woman sees in a dream that she has become bald, then this vision is evidence of negligence in her domestic duties. If a married woman dreams of

Imams such as Imam Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and other translators in the modern era, so follow us on the Roya website. What is the interpretation of seeing the birth of a girl in a dream according to Imam Ibn Sirin? Seeing the birth of a girl in a dream means hearing good news and wishing you success. A dream about the birth of a girl indicates... Mouth to death and loss. If one sees beautiful girls in a dream, this means that the situation will change for the better and the financial situation will improve. To dream that you are hugging a young girl in a dream means relief from distress, repayment of debts, and release from prison. Seeing a girl giving birth in a dream for a single girl indicates an improvement in her psychological conditions and overcoming difficulties. If an unmarried girl sees a beautiful girl in a dream, this indicates her approaching marriage to a rich, kind-hearted young man, as the vision indicates To success and prosperity in her professional life. If a girl sees an ugly girl, this indicates bad circumstances and bad luck, as it indicates her distance from God and her lack of worship. See also: Interpretation of giving birth to a non-pregnant woman in a dream. What is the vision of giving birth to a girl in a dream for a married woman? Vision Giving birth to a girl in a dream for a married woman indicates the death of worry and anxiety and the improvement of her physical and psychological condition. If a married woman sees a beautiful daughter, this indicates marital happiness and stability of the family and family. If a married woman sees a young girl and she does not have children, this means that she will become pregnant soon if she has Give birth. Male children remember that she is pregnant with a girl. A dream of a pregnant woman giving birth to her child indicates the approaching date of birth, its ease, and the cessation of fatigue and pain. If the pregnant woman sees that she is giving birth to a beautiful girl. When she is at the beginning of pregnancy, this indicates the birth of a boy, and if she is in the last months of pregnancy, this indicates a beautiful birth. girl. Girl. What is the interpretation of seeing a girl giving birth in a dream for a divorced woman? Seeing the birth of a beautiful girl in a divorced woman’s dream indicates kindness, livelihood, comfort after fatigue, and an improvement in financial conditions. It may also indicate again her marriage. If a divorced woman sees that she is breastfeeding a young girl, this indicates severe suffering. And distress that you may be exposed to. Seeing an ugly girl giving birth in a dream indicates fatigue and suffering during pregnancy and childbirth and birth ataxia. Seeing a sick girl indicates illness and bad luck. Seeing a child giving birth indicates A dead girl indicates exhaustion, adversity and distress in her life. title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a notebook in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Notebook is an important study tool that students use to record lessons and lectures. The book is also available for companies and government agencies to record certain items relating to these parties. No one can do without a book because it has many benefits and is used for many important things, and through our article we will learn about the interpretation of a dream about a notebook in a dream based on the desire of many people to know interpretations related to this dream for both men and women. Interpretation of a dream about a notebook by Ibn Sirin Notebook in The dream shows the good life and the rich life in which the dreamer lives. The notebook in the dream indicates that the person is working on reviewing his accounts. For me, seeing a notebook in a dream is something worthy of praise. Whoever dreams that he is recording thoughts in the book, this indicates collecting money and livelihood. A lost notebook in a dream indicates a waste of time. Interpretation of a dream notebook about a single woman in a dream. Seeing a notebook in a dream, and it was empty, means that the girl is always lazy and does not want to work. A white notebook in a dream is a sign of good reputation. Seeing a notebook is considered Full of papers is a sign of good luck. If a girl sees a notebook in a dream that is disorganized and spread with ink, this indicates the girl’s need to review her accounts and reconsider some of the decisions she makes. If a single woman in a dream sees the new book, this is her failure to achieve Objectives.Interpretation of a dream book about a married woman in a dream. Seeing a notebook in a married woman’s dream is an indication that she is striving for childhood and the past. Seeing a notebook in a dream shows her desire for a decent life. Seeing yourself writing in elegant handwriting in a notebook is a sign of earning a living and money. The book in a married woman's dream shows money and great dependence on the husband. Interpretation of the dream book about a pregnant woman in a dream. A notebook in a pregnant woman's dream is a sign of stress from birth. A notebook in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates kindness and dependence if the notebook is in beautiful shape. Seeing a white notebook in a dream indicates the possibility of achieving childbirth and getting rid of the problems and fears of pregnancy. A notebook in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that the period of childbirth is approaching and the woman must take care of it. If a woman sees in a dream that she is folding a notebook, this indicates safety. The fetus. Interpretation of a dream about a notebook for divorced women in a dream. A notebook in a dream can be a sign of painful memories. The new and edited notebook symbolizes a beautiful life and long-awaited happiness after years of sadness and misery. If the notebook contains news and pictures in a beautiful and coordinated way, then This indicates the extent of an individual’s integrity and success in the field of work and reaching a prominent position. Interpretation of a dream book about a man in a dream If a man sees in a dream a notebook full of stories and writings, this is a sign of kindness. A notebook full of pictures in a dream indicates that the owner of
